Articles.Content:
Hi guys

As can be seen below, I have CROSSFEED DISABLED on the Clamp-o-tron Docking port snr. connecting 2 tanks. The tank furthest from the engine is still draining. Any ideas?

I have the following mods:

BahaSP

CollisionFX

Firespitter

KerbalEngineer

KronalUtils

MagicSmokeIndust

MechJeb2

ModuleManager

New\_Horizons

QuickScroll

QuickSearch

QuizTechAero

TweakScale

![17721071449_a0cf424465_b.jpg](http://farm8.staticflickr.com/7776/17721071449_a0cf424465_b.jpg)
